snippet.title: Env_Roomtype Demonstration
snippet.description:
We have implemented a new sound effects management system for our weapons.
Each weapon can now play a different variety of sounds based on the environment location.
This feature works by itself, but also operates alongside env_soundscapes to add even more variety to the way the sfx sound.

Official Discussions: https://steamcommunity.com/app/311810/discussions/

FAQ: https://steamcommunity.com/app/311810/discussions/0/3598968030045553000/

Available Positions: https://steamcommunity.com/app/311810/discussions/1/4032472803481057132/

Community Discord: https://discord.gg/YjyEgeJ

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TripmineStudios

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TripmineStudios/

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/tripmine_studios

Indiedb: https://www.indiedb.com/games/operation-black-mesa


#TripmineStudios #OperationBlackMesa #GuardDuty
